traits.name: Constructed Nature
entries: The swarm doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

traits.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the swarm knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
entries: The swarm ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bites
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 10 (4d4 damage) piercing damage, or 5 (2d4 damage) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
